Be ready for artistic process

15 May 2006

There is a good read from Seth Godin about processes and why you don't like them. He has his point. Worth reading because he's a cool man. I know, I've experienced this. Bookshelfshop Amazon.com is still not shipping e-books ordered at amazon.com to Estonia because of some copyright restriction (but it ships hard-copies, how stupid is this). Anyway, after complaining about the problem to mr Seth Godin (I was just not able to buy his $25 e-book) he sent me his copy for free just asking to donate this money to charities. How kind is that? Anyway, here's the post: Why are you afraid of process?
